Antelopes

Artist
Voltress
Release date
2007
Format
Vinyl
Details
LP, Limited Edition
Genres
Electronic, Jazz
View on Discogs

Tracklist

  1. Guts And The Gazelle (15:50)
  2. Thirsty Zebras And The Wildebeest (14:34)
  3. Guts And The Gazelle (15:50)
  4. Thirsty Zebras And The Wildebeest (14:34)
  5. Guts And The Gazelle (Superstereo Mix) (15:53)
  6. Thirsty Zebras And The Wildebeest (Superstereo Mix) (14:33)

Notes

Comes in a hand numbered (out of 500) screen printed gatefold jacket, with a CD that has the material on the LP along with two different mixes of the pieces. Record came in two varieties, 400 copies of 180 gram black, 120 copies of 140 gram clear. Cover came in a wide variety of versions: 250 Gold Antelope front 120 Gold Antelope front w/ Black spine 110 Plain Antelope front 20 Gold Antelope front with Gold spine 5 Gold Antelope front and Gold inlay on Yellow 5 Silver inlay cover 2 Gold Antelope front with Red spine 1 Black plain cover No Color Various other super-rare one offs
